title: MacBook Pro 2021 Review: Nearly Perfect Back-to-the-Future Laptops
sub_head: Full-size ports, real function keys and other retro features, plus cutting-edge M1 Pro and M1 Max chips, make the new MacBook Pro models the laptops to beat
body:
“Study the past if you would define the future.”
Confucius might well have been referring to the 2021 14- and 16-inch MacBook Pro laptops—and the secret behind why they’re so wonderful.
